scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of figures within an arched architectural setting. In the foreground, a woman in a blue robe kneels, holding a red book. Facing her is a man in a green robe, gesturing with his hands. Behind them, several other figures with halos are visible, suggesting a religious context. The background features an ornate tapestry and windows with tracery. Above, a divine symbol of a dove surrounded by rays of light indicates a spiritual event. The overall impression is one of a sacred gathering or a moment of divine revelation.
